name: Spherecast
long_description:
Spherecast is an AI-powered inventory management software for omni-channel e-commerce brands, supporting supply chain managers with demand planning, inventory optimization, and supplier communication.

Spherecast tells brands when to reorder, how much, which warehouse to stock, and at what cost. It then autonomously executes these decisions by communicating with suppliers and manufacturers.

Spherecast helps avoid stockouts and overstock, improve inventory visibility, and save time.
one_liner: AI Supply Chain Manager for Ecommerce
